title: Melina Kana - Melina Kana (Greek Music)@flac
description:
Melina Kana was born in Thessaloniki and studied philology at the Aristotle University.
While she was a student she started singing in small venues.
In the following years she appears in many concerts of various remarkable Greek artists, such as Nikos Portokaloglou, Sokratis Malamas, Haris Alexiou, Nikos Xidakis.
